snippet: Tamira Mobley, 28, of Wood-Ridge, N.J., who has no medical training, is said to have provided clients with an illegal treatment that has become increasingly popular.
abstract: Tamira Mobley, self-described beautician from Wood-Ridge, NJ, is charged with second-degree manslaughter and first-degree assault in death of Tamara Blaine in 2013; Mobley, who has no legal training, injected silicone into Blaine’s buttocks, who then went into a seizure and later died.
lead_paragraph: Tamira Mobley, 28, of Wood-Ridge, N.J., who has no medical training, is said to have provided clients with an illegal treatment that has become increasingly popular.

headline.main: Woman Charged in Death Caused by Silicone Injection
headline.print_headline: Woman Charged in Death Caused by Silicone Injection
